name: Samsung Galaxy S21
summary: A high-end smartphone with advanced camera features and 5G connectivity.
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 offers powerful performance, a sleek design, and an incredible camera system, perfect for capturing every moment.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
summary: Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with premium sound quality.
description: Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones are perfect for music lovers who want to enjoy a fully immersive audio experience with unparalleled noise-canceling technology.

name: Asus ROG Strix G17
summary: High-performance gaming laptop with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics.
description: The Asus ROG Strix G17 is designed for gamers who demand powerful performance and stunning visuals in a portable package.

name: Apple MacBook Air M1
summary: Lightweight laptop with Apple's powerful M1 chip for exceptional performance.
description: The MacBook Air with M1 delivers blazing-fast performance in a lightweight and fanless design, perfect for both professionals and students.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
summary: High-performance running shoes for maximum comfort and support.
description: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 provides responsive cushioning, excellent durability, and a sleek design for runners of all levels.
